system.effect:
Trigger: You or your Pokémon create a Weather Condition
Effect: The Weather is particularly intense and has additional effects as listed below.
- Hail: All Trainers and Pokémon that take Hail Damage take a -5 Penalty to all Damage Rolls.
- Rain: Trainers and Pokémon that are not Water or Grass Typed can only take Standard OR Shift Action during their turns, but not both.
- Sandstorm: All Trainers and Pokémon that take Sandstorm damage take a -2 Penalty to Accuracy Rolls.
- Sun: Trainers and Pokémon that are not Fire or Grass Typed can only use At-Will and EOT Frequency Moves.
system.name: Extreme Weather [CR]
